titleStmt.title: A letter sent to a worthy member of the House of Commons, concerning the Lord Shandois coming to Cisseter to execute the Commission of Array. Read in the House of Commons, and ordered to be forthwith printed. H. Elsynge, Cler. Parl. D. Com.
titleStmt.author: Giffard, John.
England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by L.N. and I.F. for Edward Husbands and John Franck, and are to be sold at their shops in the middle Temple, and the Kings-head in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: their shops in the middle Temple
